home.subtitle: Your journey to better mental health starts here

hero.title: Comprehensive Mental Health Support
hero.description: Access professional mental health services, AI-powered support, and a caring community all in one place.

errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
errors.accountExists: An account with this email already exists
errors.accountNotFound: No account found with this email

screening.title: Mental Health Screening
screening.subtitle: This screening will help us understand how you've been feeling
screening.instructions: Please answer each question based on how you have been feeling over the past two weeks.

instructions_detailed.title: Instructions
instructions_detailed.description: Answer based on how you've felt in the past 2 weeks

phq9.q1: Little interest or pleasure in doing things
phq9.q3: Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much
phq9.q4: Feeling tired or having little energy
phq9.q6: Feeling bad about yourself - or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down
phq9.q7: Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television
phq9.q8: Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed. Or the opposite - being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual
phq9.q9: Thoughts that you would be better off dead, or of hurting yourself

recommendations.title: Recommendations
recommendations.minimal: Your results suggest minimal symptoms. Continue maintaining good mental health practices.
recommendations.mild: Your results suggest mild symptoms. Consider speaking with a mental health professional.
recommendations.moderate: Your results suggest moderate symptoms. We recommend professional support.
recommendations.moderatelySevere: Your results suggest moderately severe symptoms. Please seek professional help.
recommendations.severe: Your results suggest severe symptoms. Please seek immediate professional help.

chat.title: AI Chat Support
chat.subtitle: Get instant support from our AI assistant

suggestions.title: Try asking about:
examples: How can I improve my sleep?
I need help with stress management

disclaimer.title: Important Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: This AI assistant provides general information and support. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. If you're experiencing a mental health crisis, please contact emergency services or a mental health professional immediately.
